Fusion energy could be the solution to global power problems
Description
April 7, 2019
For decades, scientists have strived to recreate "fusion energy," the same chemical reaction that fuels the sun and the stars. Both private and public entities are vying to be the first to bring it to earth. As Robin Gill reports, one B.C. company has the likes of Jeff Bezos and Bill Gates funding millions to make it happen.
